nodes.text: The Cezith system was a star system located in the Clacis sector, within the Outer Rim Territories and New Territories regions of the galaxy. The system was connected by the Relgim Run hyperlane to the Endoraan and Marmoth systems, and a smaller hyperspace route linked it to the Venestria system.

The Cezith system was home to the Cezith water-lily plant. The system fell within the borders of the Pentastar Alignment between the years 4 ABY and 12 ABY, and was a part of the Imperial Remnant between 18 ABY and 35 ABY, remaining part of the latter government by 40 ABY.
The Cezith system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-4.
